pullRequest.title: Add Remote Config Parameter Group type
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add Remote Config Parameter Group type
Implement equals() in all public RC types
Add unit tests for public RC types
Refactor existing unit tests to use equals() when comparing templates

Related to: #446

nodes.bodyText: Does this work on collections like maps?
Move into a separate test case: testConstructorWithColor
Just new Parameter(null) without the assignment
